revision.text: ==English== ===Noun=== {{head|en|noun form}} # {{plural of|en|xenophobia}} #* '''1949''', Ralph Barton Perry, ''Characteristically American'' page 68. #*: ''Even our '''xenophobias''', our isolationisms, and our Know-Nothingisms, have found support in the perversions and distortions of this creed.'' #* '''1994''', Damien Broderick, ''Reading by Starlight'' page 114. #*: ''If this last, embracing the alien, seems an advance on previous '''xenophobias''', it is largely illusory.'' #* '''2003''', Diana Abu-Jaber, ''Arabian Jazz'' page 329. #*: ''There is nothing unique or magical about the Middle East; it shares '''xenophobias''' and violences with all the rest of the world!''
